titleStmt.title: A just narrative, or account of the man whose hands and legs rotted off, in the parish of Kings-Swinford, in Stafford-shire, where he died, June 21, 1677 carefully collected by Ja. Illingworth ...
titleStmt.author: Illingworth, James, d. 1693.
Newey, Jonathan.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.C. for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: A discourse between John Duncalf and Jonathan Newey signed by the latter Aug. 17, 1677.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
